categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Tierfon Launch Base was an Alliance to Restore the Republic military base on Tierfon, which was considered at least a level five starfighter hub during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. It served as the home for the Tierfon Yellow Ace Chase Squadron. Encroaching Imperial patrols necessitated the scuttling of the base in 0 BBY, which led the squadron to be broken up and reassigned to other postings.
